entry.title: 5 pack - 6"x106" Dusty Sage Satin Chair Sashes
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 2.39

[About]

  • Quantity: 5 Chair Sashes
  • Material: Satin style with shiny finish
  • Color: Dusty Sage
  • Size: 6" wide x 106" long.
  • Edges are serged to form an elegant look when tied into bow form.
  • All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
  • Buy Sash Buckles

[Information]

Satin has an unsurpassed sophistication and charismatic appeal about itself, it is undoubtedly, most preferred embellishing fabric that is adored by people all over the world and is tirelessly utilized in designing elegant formal attires, accessories, decorative flowers, ornaments and a lot more. Pair these Satin Chair Sashes with complementing rosette chair covers, table covers, and runners. For a more exotic look, adorn these glistening sashes with rhinestone sash buckles and sash pins.

Additional Information:

  • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
  • How To Care: Dry Clean Only
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
